definitions.text: a vine or climbing plant that readily grows up a support or over other plants
someone seeking social prominence by obsequious behavior

examples: a solitary mounter of the staircase

definitions.text: someone who climbs as a sport; especially someone who climbs mountains
examples: the lead climber looked strong still but his partner often slumped in his ropes

definitions.text: an iron spike attached to the shoe to prevent slipping on ice when walking or climbing
